N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.3 - Establishment of day placement programs

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with the requirements of this

Part, the director may establish day placement programs, such as evening and
weekend reporting centers. (b) Each
day placement program shall have: (1)
a
written description of the nature and purpose of the program; (2)
a written description of services to be
provided by the program; (3)
written criteria for placement in the program, which shall include
consideration of the recommendations of the applicable family court, presentment agency, probation department and the youth's legal representative; and
(4)
a requirement that all
youth and parents consent to conditions of participation. Notes
